examples.example: 可爱的学生们在教室里认真地学习知识。

translate.english: Lovely students are studying knowledge earnestly in the classroom.

examples.example: 充满朝气的学生们在广阔的操场上尽情地挥洒着青春的汗水。

translate.english: Vibrant students are freely shedding the sweat of youth on the vast playground.

examples.example: 可爱的学生们在明亮的教室里快乐地探讨着问题。

translate.english: Lovely students are happily discussing problems in the bright classroom.
